entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @HHS_ASH Rates of testing per capita are far, far lower in the US. This is a bunch of PR garbage and you know it. We all see it. Stop the lies. #Trump is so clearly failing on #coronavirus. Most deaths in the world here. What a deadly disgrace.
